description:
Chris tells the girls that Little Red Riding Hood is in the human world. They quickly find her, but she becomes hungry and unable to move in no time. That is when Yamamori Azuki, a highschool student, passes by carrying a large paper bag. Azuki`s younger sister, Yamamori Botan, goes to the same kindergarten as Ringo`s brothers. Seeing the famished Little Red Riding Hood, Azuki takes a hamburger out of her bag. Little Red Riding Hood is overjoyed at the deliciousness of her first hamburger. She wants to do something in return for Azuki and is asked to help set up for her little sister`s birthday party. Meanwhile, in Fairy Land, the Big Bad Wolf is searching for Little Red Riding Hood...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 赤ずきんちゃんいらっしゃい☆ぷりっ!
